entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few rain showers beginning near noon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
